fullText: What starts as a fairly standard story of opposites attracting becomes something much more surprising and complex, thanks to performances by Mia Farrow and Patti LuPone that are both generous and ruthless.
dtliExcerpt: What starts as a fairly standard story of opposites attracting becomes something much more surprising and complex, thanks to performances by Mia Farrow and Patti LuPone that are both generous and ruthless.
